article_title: A.M. Links: Hillary vs. Bernie on Race, Planned Parenthood Defunding Measure Fails in Senate, Trump Continues to Lead GOP Hopefuls in Polls
article_text:
Follow us on Facebook and Twitter , and don’t forget to sign up for Reason’s daily updates for more content.

Damon Root is a senior editor of Reason magazine and the author of Overruled: The Long War for Control of the U.S. Supreme Court (Palgrave Macmillan).

og.title: A.M. Links: Hillary vs. Bernie on Race, Planned Parenthood Defunding Measure Fails in Senate, Trump Continues to Lead GOP Hopefuls in Polls

twitter.description:
Hillary Clinton is now attacking Bernie Sanders for his views on race.


A Republican-led measure to defund Planned Parenthood failed to advance in the Senate last night by a floor vote of 53-46.


"
